data Freer f a where
  • Pure :: a -> Freer f a
  • Impure :: f a -> (a -> Freer f b) -> Freer f b
name: Freer Impure Pure

display_html:
newtype Fixpoint (f :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type) (g :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type) :: Type -> Type where
  • Fixpoint :: {..} -> Fixpoint f g a
name: Fixpoint unFixpoint Fixpoint

class InterpretOneLayer f g m where

display_html: type Effect = (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type
name: Effect

display_html:
data JoinedEffects (ops :: [Effect]) :: Effect where
  • JoinedEffectsHere :: op m a -> JoinedEffects (op ': ops) m a
  • JoinedEffectsThere :: JoinedEffects ops m a -> JoinedEffects (op ': ops) m a
name: JoinedEffects JoinedEffectsThere JoinedEffectsHere

display_html:
class EffectInject (op :: Effect) (ops :: [Effect]) | ops -> op where
  • effectInject :: op m a -> JoinedEffects ops m a
name: EffectInject effectInject

display_html: type AST ops = Fixpoint Freer (JoinedEffects ops)
name: AST

display_html: astInject :: EffectInject op ops => op (AST ops) a -> AST ops a
name: astInject

display_html:
class InterpretEffect m op where
  • interpretEffect :: (forall b. AST ops b -> m b) -> op (AST ops) a -> m a
name: InterpretEffect interpretEffect

display_html:
data ConstraintList :: (a -> Constraint) -> [a] -> Type where
  • ConstraintNil :: ConstraintList c '[]
  • ConstraintCons :: c ty => ConstraintList c tys -> ConstraintList c (ty ': tys)
name: ConstraintList ConstraintCons ConstraintNil

display_html:
class InterpretEffects m ops where
  • interpretEffects :: ConstraintList (InterpretEffect m) ops
name: InterpretEffects interpretEffects

display_html: interpretAST :: (Monad m, InterpretEffects m ops) => AST ops a -> m a
name: interpretAST

class InterpretEffectStateful (t :: Type -> Type) m op where

name: InterpretEffectStateful interpretEffectStateful

name: interpretASTStateful

display_html:
data Ltl a
  • = LtlTruth
  • | LtlFalsity
  • | LtlAtom a
  • | LtlOr (Ltl a) (Ltl a)
  • | LtlAnd (Ltl a) (Ltl a)
  • | LtlNext (Ltl a)
  • | LtlUntil (Ltl a) (Ltl a)
  • | LtlRelease (Ltl a) (Ltl a)
name: Ltl LtlTruth LtlFalsity LtlAtom LtlOr LtlAnd LtlNext LtlUntil LtlRelease

data LtlInterpHigherOrder (mod :: Type) (m :: Type -> Type) (ops :: [Effect]) (a :: Type) where

  • Nested :: ((forall b. [Ltl mod] -> AST ops b -> m (b, [Ltl mod])) -> [Ltl mod] -> m (a, [Ltl mod])) -> LtlInterpHigherOrder mod m ops a
name: LtlInterpHigherOrder Direct Nested

data LtlInstanceKind

display_html:
class InterpretEffectsLtl (mod :: Type) (m :: Type -> Type) (tags :: [LtlInstanceKind]) (ops :: [Effect]) where

data NextBind t x where
  • DoNothing :: x -> NextBind t x
  • Fail :: NextBind t ()
  • Now :: t x -> NextBind t x
  • Branch :: NextBind t x -> NextBind t x -> NextBind t x
  • Next :: NextBind t y -> (y -> NextBind t x) -> NextBind t x
name: NextBind Now DoNothing Branch Next Fail

display_html:
data Interpretation t m ops a where
  • Direct :: (forall x. t x -> m (Maybe (a, x))) -> Interpretation t m ops a
  • Nested :: AST ops b -> (forall x. NextBind t x -> NextBind t x) -> (forall x. m (b, NextBind t x) -> m (a, NextBind t x)) -> Interpretation t m ops a
name: Interpretation Nested Direct

class InterpretNextBind t m op where
